# size

**Instance Property**

The size of the image that you want to create.

## Declaration

```swift
var size: CGSize { get set }
```

```swift
var size: NSSize { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is 256 by 256 points.

## Configuring the image output

- **traitCollection**: Traits that determine the appearance of the map snapshot.
- **appearance**: The visual style (light or dark) to apply to the map when rendering the snapshot image.
- **scale**: The scale factor to use when creating the image.
